system:
note description: "Portable Network Graphics (PNG) Graphical Format Abstraction used by {../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP}.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_save_to_named_filesave_to_named_file" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2013-01-11 10:28:37 -0800 (Fri, 11 Jan 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 90517 $"
class ../interface/ev_png_format.xmlEV_PNG_FORMAT
inherit ../interface/ev_graphical_format.xmlEV_GRAPHICAL_FORMAT
create Falsedefault_create
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xmlEV_PIXMAP_I} -- Access
f_file_extension../interface/ev_png_format.xml#f_file_extensionFile_extension: FalseSTRING_32 -- Three character file extension associated with format. once Result := {FalseSTRING_32}"png" end
f_save../interface/ev_png_format.xml#f_savesave (raw_image_data: ../interface/ev_raw_image_data.xmlEV_RAW_IMAGE_DATA; a_filepath: FalsePATH) -- Save raw_image_data to file a_filepath in PNG format. do end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2012, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../interface/ev_png_format.xmlEV_PNG_FORMAT
